tool.description:
Converts SGO Mistika structures to xml. (c) 2016 - 2017 Bengt Ove Sannes bengtove@bovesan.com
Usage (command line): mistika-xml.py [-s] [-v] [-y] inputfile1 [inputfile2 ...]
The xml file will be stored next to the input file.
-a Validate output file -s Write output to stdout instead of to file -v Verbose output (written to stderr) -y Overwrite existing files without interaction
